# Welcome to Football Analysis

This website is designed to analyze football plays by collecting and organizing play data. Use the navigation bar to:
- Enter play data in the **Analysis** section.
- View grouped statistics for better insights.
- Explore football strategies and tips in the **Blog**.

Whether you're a coach, player, or football enthusiast, this site will help you understand the dynamics of the game.

Enjoy exploring!
